hero.title: Invest in Dubai real estate safely, profitably, and with 100% guidance
hero.subtitle: Discover exclusive real estate investment opportunities in Dubai. Verified projects, high returns and personalized advice.
hero.badge: Up to +8–30% annual in prime areas
hero.card_1_text: Down payment. Installment plan up to 30 months

about.title: WHY INVEST IN DUBAI?
about.description: Dubai's real estate market offers high rental demand, strong capital appreciation, and highly favorable tax conditions, allowing investors to earn dollar-based returns with no tax on rental income or capital gains.

benefits.tax_free: 0% tax on rental income and capital gains

one_river_point.title: Dubai Water Canal
one_river_point.description: One River Point is located in the heart of Business Bay, on a unique plot facing the Dubai Water Canal. One of Dubai's most dynamic areas, combining a cosmopolitan lifestyle, direct connection to Downtown, and high long-term appreciation potential.
one_river_point.market_insight: Business Bay continues to consolidate as one of Dubai's most sought-after districts, driven by world-class infrastructure, high-end projects, and strong interest from both residents and international investors.

costa_mare.area: AL MARJAN ISLAND · RAS AL KHAIMAH
costa_mare.title: Luxury Island Resort
costa_mare.description: Costa Mare is located on the waterfront of Al Marjan Island, one of the most exclusive coastal destinations with the highest growth projection in the UAE. An iconic development combining resort-style living, sustainability, smart technology, and direct beach access.
features: Expanding area with resorts, casinos, and premium lifestyle
costa_mare.market_insight: Al Marjan Island is experiencing strong appreciation driven by new luxury resorts, international tourism development, and major strategic investments in Ras Al Khaimah, positioning it as a solid alternative to Dubai for long-term investors.

mercer_house.title: The New Heart of Uptown
mercer_house.description: Mercer House is located in Uptown Dubai, one of the city's most ambitious new-generation urban districts. An iconic project combining contemporary design, wellness, entertainment, and vibrant urban life, positioning itself as Dubai's new residential and social meeting point.
mercer_house.market_insight: Uptown Dubai is in full revitalization and consolidation as a new premium urban hub. The combination of connectivity, lifestyle, commercial spaces, and design residences positions Mercer House as an attractive opportunity for both living and investing in an area with strong appreciation potential.

sobha_central.title: Urban Connectivity Redefined
sobha_central.description: Sobha Central is located directly on Sheikh Zayed Road, Dubai's most important artery. A mixed-use development composed of six interconnected residential towers, designed for those seeking to live, work, and invest in the true center of the city's urban movement.
features: Direct connection to Sheikh Zayed Road
Panoramic views of Dubai Marina, JLT, Bluewaters, and Palm Jumeirah
sobha_central.market_insight: Projects located on Sheikh Zayed Road maintain high demand for both residential and investment purposes. The combination of connectivity, mixed-use, large-scale amenities, and the Sobha brand positions Sobha Central as a solid opportunity for appreciation and profitability in the medium to long term.

sobha_hartland_ii.area: MBR CITY · NAD AL SHEBA · DUBAI
sobha_hartland_ii.title: Nature at the Heart of the City
sobha_hartland_ii.description: Sobha Hartland II is a luxury waterfront residential community of over 8 million square feet, strategically located near Downtown Dubai. An iconic development combining lagoons, artificial beaches, vast green areas, and high-end residences, offering a perfect balance between nature, exclusivity, and urban connection.
features: Quick access to Ras Al Khor Road and Al Khail Road
sobha_hartland_ii.market_insight: Waterfront master plan communities in central areas like MBR City present one of the highest appreciation projections in Dubai. Sobha Hartland II capitalizes on the proven success of Sobha Hartland, combining premium brand, scale, nature, and strategic location, making it a solid opportunity for both living and long-term investment.

azizi_milan.area: SHEIKH MOHAMMED BIN ZAYED ROAD · DUBAI
azizi_milan.title: The Italian Soul of Dubai
azizi_milan.description: Azizi Milan is a city within a city, inspired by the lifestyle, fashion, and architecture of Milan. Strategically located on Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, this master development combines residences, retail, offices, culture, wellness, and entertainment in a self-sufficient, sustainable, and new-generation community.
features: Direct access to Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road
Quick connectivity to Dubai International Airport and Al Maktoum Airport
Close to Global Village, IMG Worlds of Adventure, and key Dubai districts
azizi_milan.market_insight: Azizi Milan positions itself as one of Dubai's most ambitious urban developments, standing out for its net-zero carbon city concept, walkable focus, and integration of lifestyle, retail, and business. Self-sufficient master communities with strong identity and sustainable vision present high appreciation and demand potential in the long term, for both residents and investors.

unit_types.title: Real Estate Investment Formats
unit_types.subtitle: Select from different types of off-plan units in Dubai according to profitability, term, and investment objective.
unit_types.whatsapp_message: Hello, I am interested in receiving all the details about this property and similar opportunities currently available. Please include updated prices, payment plan, return expectations (ROI), availability, and options to schedule a visit.

sobha_hartland_ii.description: Exclusive luxury waterfront residential community developed by Sobha Realty, located in the heart of Dubai.

sobha_central.title: Sobha Central
sobha_central.description: Residential and mixed-use complex located on Sheikh Zayed Road, composed of six interconnected towers.

sobha_sanctuary.title: Sobha Sanctuary
sobha_sanctuary.description: Premium residential community designed as an urban sanctuary where nature and wellness integrate.

azizi_milan.title: Azizi Milan
azizi_milan.description: Large-scale urban development inspired by the essence of Milan, strategically located opposite the Majan district.

azizi_venice.title: Azizi Venice
azizi_venice.description: Mega residential and lifestyle development inspired by Venice, located in Dubai South, redefining waterfront living.

azizi_monaco_mansions.title: Azizi Monaco Mansions
azizi_monaco_mansions.description: Exclusive collection of ultra-luxury mansions facing the crystal lagoon in Dubai South, within Azizi Venice.

azizi_wasel.title: Azizi Wasel
azizi_wasel.description: Waterfront residential project located on Dubai Islands combining panoramic ocean and skyline views.

presentation.title: Receive the detailed project presentation
presentation.description: We have prepared a complete presentation with updated prices, flexible payment plans, and detailed profitability calculations (ROI) for each unit type.
presentation.disclaimer:
We will send you the presentation immediately via WhatsApp or email. 
No obligation · Clear information · Support in your language

developers.title: Strategic Alliances with Dubai's Leading Developers

why_choose.title: Why Dubai is the center of future real estate investment
why_choose.description: Dubai has positioned itself as one of the world's most solid, visionary, and profitable real estate markets, with a clear growth strategy for the next two decades.
benefits: Dubai: economic vision and sustained growth for 20 years.
Strategic alliance based on data, not just intermediation.
Strategic real estate consulting in your language.
Access to VIP properties and off-market opportunities
why_choose.quote: For us, reputation matters more than a quick deal.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Let us help you find a property that is not only a profitable asset but also a place of energy, inspiration, and growth.

hero.title: Invest in Bali. The new global epicenter of tourism, luxury, and sustainable profitability.
hero.subtitle: Strategic properties in the most demanded island of Southeast Asia. High appreciation, growing international tourism, and attractive dollar returns.
hero.badge: Up to +8-35% annual in prime areas

stats.text: Global hub for digital nomads and startups
Estimated ROI between 8% and 14% gross annual in premium areas

about.title: Why is Bali the new blue gold of global tourism?
about.description:
Bali is not just an island: it is a consolidated international brand.
Recognized as one of the most demanded destinations in the world, it combines luxury tourism, wellness, nature, and culture in an economic ecosystem highly attractive for real estate investors.
From the G20 Summit in 2022 to its consolidation as a digital nomad hub, Bali positions itself as the economic thermometer of Southeast Asia.

benefits.demand: High demand for premium vacation rentals
benefits.roi: Estimated ROI between 8% and 14% gross annual
benefits.emerging: Emerging market with high appreciation potential

why_choose.title: Why Bali is the new epicenter of real estate investment in Asia
why_choose.description:
Bali has consolidated itself as one of the most attractive emerging markets in Southeast Asia, combining record tourism growth, sustained international demand, and a new generation of digital investors driving the island's real estate market.
The island not only sells lifestyle: it sells profitability backed by constant occupancy and progressive appreciation.
benefits: ✓ Bali: sustained tourism growth and international expansion.
✓ Market driven by digital nomads and premium tourism.
✓ High demand for villas, boutique residences, and wellness projects.
✓ Competitive returns vs other global destinations.
why_choose.quote: “Investing in Bali is not just buying property, it is entering the heart of global tourism.”

body_sense.title: BODY SENSE
body_sense.description: The project is located in the prestigious Pandawa cliffside area — one of the fastest-growing wellness and lifestyle destinations in Bali, combining ocean views, biohacking infrastructure, and strong rental demand.
body_sense.market_insight: Wellness-focused properties are attracting high-spending tourists, driving premium nightly rates and stable annual returns.

rahya_villas.title: RAHYA VILLAS COMPLEX
rahya_villas.description: The project is located just 500 meters from Pandawa Beach — a rapidly developing premium coastal area known for private villas, white sand beaches, and high occupancy vacation rentals.
rahya_villas.market_insight: The Bukit area continues to experience strong capital appreciation due to limited land supply and rising tourism demand.

eighth_sense.title: EIGHTH SENSE
eighth_sense.description: Situated on a panoramic cliff overlooking the Indian Ocean, Eighth Sense offers elevated privacy, ocean sunsets, and proximity to Bali’s most iconic beaches.
features: 20 Minutes to Ngurah Rai International Airport
eighth_sense.market_insight: Cliffside ocean-view properties consistently outperform standard units in rental pricing and long-term value growth.

iji_home.title: IJI HOME
iji_home.description: Operating across the most demanded areas of South Bali, including Pandawa, Bukit, and Nusa Dua — locations with year-round occupancy and strong international tourism inflow.
iji_home.market_insight: Professional property management significantly increases occupancy rates and annual yield compared to self-managed units.

body_sense.title: Body Sense
body_sense.description: Oceanfront wellness complex in Pandawa Beach with suites and villas designed for biohacking, spa, and high profitability in Bali.

rahya_villas.title: Rahya Villas Complex
rahya_villas.description: Modern villas with private pool 500m from Pandawa Beach, ideal for living or generating income with high tourist occupancy.

eighth_sense.title: Eighth Sense
eighth_sense.description: Cliffside residences and villas with panoramic ocean views, private rooftop, and estimated profitability up to 15% annual.
